reviewText:
Got the VHS for 2 woman in it Monique Parent and Shae Marks.
this is a soft porn movie if u like ta ta movies this is for you.

Scoring is one of many great softcore porn movies that came out in the 1990's. It's about a man that creates music for films and how he tries to find that special someone(a hooker)that he can spend his nights with. Well,that special someone does come along and she is a nice hot redhead! This Hooker with a heart of Gold gets to know this music creator by having lots and lots of hot sex with him. What makes Scoring a great softcore porn movie is that it really has a pretty good plot. No,Really! This man that loves hookers oh so much finds that his life starts to mirror one of the movies he is creating music for. Somebody is trying to kill him,is it the burnt out rocker that he pissed off,is it his girlfriend or is it the new Redheaded lady of the night?Hot sex,great backdrops,solid story,Scoring is one of those great softcore porn movies that they just don't make anymore. This one is a must see! Just make sure you get the UNRATED version because the R-Rated version has all the sex taken out of it. If you want to see the whole movie ALWAYS GET THE UNRATED VERSION!
